Increases the Damage dealt by Arctic Spear.\nAdds a Cooldown to the Skill.
提高该技能造成的伤害。\n为此技能添加一段冷却时间。
Arctic Spear converts Weapon Physical Damage to Rend Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
极地之矛将武器物理伤害转化为撕裂伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

It is forbidden to spill blood within a temple of Etheliel, and yet a tenet of their practices is sacrificing the beautiful. This is not as contradictory as it seems: Etheliel prefers a bloodless, peaceful sacrifice. An initiate priest of her order once botched a sacrifice, leaving a victim hemorrhaging on the courtyard tiles, pierced through the lung with a lance. Etheliel reduced the priest and the victim both a fine powdery snow, wishing to erase their ugliness from the world.
禁止在耶特利尔的神庙内洒血，但他们的一个原则是献祭美丽。这并不像看上去那么矛盾：耶特利尔更钟爱无血的和平献祭。她牧师团的一位初级牧师曾经做过一次献祭，在庭院的瓷砖上留下了一个流血的受害者，用长矛刺穿了他的肺部。耶特利尔把牧师和受害者都化作了一团白雪，希望将他们的丑陋都从世间抹去。
Arctic Spear converts Weapon Physical Damage to Aether Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
极地之矛将武器物理伤害转化为以太伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The Weave of Time is a delicate tapestry, with all threads finding their anchor in Anulai-Tai’s body. Those who’re able to perceive Anulai-Tai’s form see an entity pierced through with a gigantic lance, crouched over in agony. Most who see this go mad, and the rest remain in blissful ignorance: that lance is all which our conception of time rests on. That lance is the Keystone of the Weave, and should it fall from Anulai-Tai’s body, then so would all of time.
时间之纱是一条精致的织锦，所有的时间线都在阿努莱-泰的身体里找到了锚点。那些能够感知到阿努莱-泰形体的人看到一个实体被一支巨大的长矛刺穿，痛苦地蹲在那里。大多数看到这一景象的人都会发疯，而其他人则仍然处于幸福的无知之中：我们对时间的概念所依赖的就是这只长矛。长矛是时之纱的基石，如果它从阿努莱-泰的身体上掉落，那么一切都将在那一刻停止。
Increases the Damage dealt by Arctic Spear.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Winter's Grasp converts Weapon Physical Damage to Frost Damage.
寒冬之握将武器伤害转化为冰霜伤害。
Increases Winter's Grasp's Area of Effect.
增加该技能的作用范围。
Reduces the Cooldown of Winter's Grasp.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
Increases the Duration of Ailments applied with Winter's Grasp.
增加该技能造成的异常状态的持续时间。
You can use Winter's Grasp on the targeted location.
该技能可以被施放到指定位置。

Hidden temples of Etheliel are haunting sights: their chilling halls display all types of frozen creatures that were brought there for 'immortality' by cultists. In order to curry her favor, the cultists have unholy rituals at the heart of the temple where they freeze young, beautiful prisoners as sacrifice.
耶特利尔被隐藏的神庙中是令人难以忘怀的景象：冰冷的大厅里陈列着各种各样的被冰封的生物，它们被邪教徒带到这里来获得“永生”。为了讨好她，邪教者在神庙的中心举行不洁的仪式，他们把年轻漂亮的囚犯冷冻起来作为祭品。
Winter's Grasp converts Weapon Physical Damage to Shadow Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
寒冬之握将武器物理伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The ice of the Lady of Vanity has lost its natural purity since she became a Fallen. Now it is filled with a lethal determination to spread over the world, a desire to fill each shadow with ice as shadow fills her heart. Through her unholy touch, Moros channels his remaining power, spreading his tainted shadow across the mortal plain.
自从虚荣女神成为堕落者，她的寒冰也失去了其与生俱来的纯净。如今它充满了要蔓延全世界的致命决意，那是要让冰霜填满每处阴影的欲望，一如填满她内心的阴影。摩洛斯引导他剩余的力量，通过耶特利尔的不洁之触，将他那被污染的阴影撒向凡间。
Increases the Damage dealt by Winter's Grasp.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Winter's Grasp's Area of Effect persists for a few seconds, dealing Damage to Enemies at regular intervals.
该技能的会在地面上留下持续几秒钟的周期性伤害区域。
Using Winter's Grasp grants a Buff to the Damage Type dealt by the Skill.\nAllies within its Area of Effect benefit from the same Damage Type Buff.
使用该技能会授予一个额外伤害Buff，额外伤害类型与该技能一致。\n作用范围内的盟友也会获得相同伤害类型的Buff。

Etheliel knows generosity when it comes to sharing her power with mortals: she sees sorcerers and cultists as mere pawns serving her great ambition whenever they summon her cold embrace. Every time her Frost touches the world, she moves one step closer to her ultimate victory. In a way, ignorant sorcerers are just as dangerous as malignant cultists.
耶特利尔在与凡人分享力量方面十分慷慨：当巫师和邪教徒召唤她的冰冷拥抱时，她只不过将他们视作为她的野心服务的傀儡。每次她的霜冻触动世界，她都离她最终的胜利更近一步。在某种程度上，无知的巫师和邪恶的巫师一样危险。
Enemies killed while they are Frozen by Winter's Grasp have a chance to trigger another ice nova.
被寒冬之握冻结的敌人被击杀有几率再触发一次冰霜新星。
Increases the Damage dealt by Winter's Grasp.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of Winter's Grasp.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt by Winter's Grasp.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of Winter's Grasp.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt by Ailments applied with Winter's Grasp.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Reduces the Cooldown of Winter's Grasp.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
Increases the Damage dealt by Winter's Grasp.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Winter's Grasp converts Weapon Physical Damage to Toxic Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
寒冬之握将武器物理伤害转化为毒素伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

When Bezeriel was summoned back from the Abyss, the force of his entrance into Wolcen created a toxic cyclone which engulfed a hundred miles. The creatures strong enough to survive the toxins succumbed when they saw what emerged from the Abyss, something no mortal eye could bear to see: Bezeriel, the dead primordial, his cadaveric body warped by the Abyss into something beyond comprehension.
当贝泽瑞尔被从深渊召唤回来时，他进入Wolcen的力量制造了一个吞噬百里的剧毒旋风。即便是那些强大到能够在毒素中存活的生物，看到从深渊中爬出的恐怖存在时，亦无法抵挡，那是一切凡间生物的眼睛都无法直视的：贝泽瑞尔，死去的原初神，他的尸体被深渊扭曲成了不可名状的东西。
Winter's Grasp converts Weapon Physical Damage to Fire Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
寒冬之握将武器物理伤害转化为火焰伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Abanazaar was imbalanced after splitting from his siblings. He deployed his flames indiscriminately, without understanding the harm they caused. But as Etheliel came to him, wishing to fuse again, her touch instigated something. He remembered being something more than unbound deflagration. Though he rejected Etheliel, he learned from her the ability to control the wildfires of the world and stifle them into mere smoke.
阿巴纳扎和他的兄弟姐妹分开后，失去了制衡。他不分青红皂白地释放火焰，却不了解它们造成的危害。但当耶特利尔来到他面前想再次融合时，她的触碰激起了一些东西。他想起自己能做的不仅仅是无拘无束的爆燃。尽管他拒绝了耶特利尔，但他从她身上学到了控制整个世界的野火并将其熄灭为青烟的能力。
Increases the Damage dealt by Winter's Grasp.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Tracker's Reach deals Damage based on your Weapon Damage if it can deal Damage.
追捕者之触造成的伤害将基于有基础伤害的武器伤害。
Increases the maximum Range of Tracker's Reach.
增加该技能的最大距离。
Stuns Enemies Hit by Tracker's Reach.
击晕被钩链命中的敌人。
You generate Rage when Tracker's Reach Hits an Enemy.
该技能每击中一个敌人都会生成怒气。
You are pulled to the location of the last Enemy Hit by Tracker's Reach.
你会被拉到钩子击中的最后一个敌人的位置。

Equipped with Kirenas, Sarisel was fighting a powerful demon lord. He used the grappling hook to pull it to him, but the demon was too strong and stood firm. The two gauged each other for a moment, holding the chain. That's when Sarisel chose to revert the mechanism of Kirenas, pulling himself towards his target. Caught off-guard, the demon lord was put down in a single blow to the head.
萨利塞尔曾带着基勒纳斯与一位强大的恶魔领主战斗。他试图用抓钩把对方拽到自己身边，但这位恶魔领主太强壮了，巍然不动。就在双方拽着链子僵持不下时，萨里塞尔当机立断，重新激活了基勒纳斯的机括，把自己拉向他的目标。恶魔领主措手不及，被一击爆头，当场毙命。
Tracker's Reach converts Weapon Physical Damage to Rend Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
追捕者之触将武器物理伤害转化为撕裂伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Sarisel did not sharpen Kirenas - the nicks and scratches that it picked up were like war trophies to him. This decay would never destroy the hook, for it was crafted by Hephaaron, but the imperfections added a new level of lethality. The notches dug into the hook’s target, lacerating the flesh of Sarisel’s quarry.
萨利塞尔并未磨砺过基勒纳斯-它上面的刮痕对他来说就像战利品一样。这些小刮小蹭永远也不会造成抓钩的损坏，因为它是赫法耶博的作品。但这些瑕疵却让抓钩的致命程度额外提高一层，刮痕嵌入了抓钩目标的身体，撕裂萨利塞尔猎物的血肉。
Reduces the Cooldown of Tracker's Reach.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
Enemies Hit with Tracker's Reach have a chance to drop Health Globes.
被钩链命中的敌人有几率掉落生命球。
Tracker's Reach launches hooks all around your location.
钩链会向四面八方发射。

Sarisel, Primordial of Purity, is known for his obsessive hunts of all that he deems tainted. While he was in the possession of Kirenas, it quickly became the extension of his will, searching and reaching evil in the most obscure corners of the world.
萨利塞尔，纯净之源，因痴迷于狩猎那些他认定被污染的存在而闻名。当基勒纳斯被他所拥有，很快就变成了他意志的延伸，帮助他搜寻和够到躲在世界最阴暗角落的邪恶。
Tracker's Reach applies Stasis on Enemies.
该技能会造成敌人停滞。
Increases the Damage dealt by Tracker's Reach.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Increases the Damage dealt by Tracker's Reach.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Increases the maximum Range of Tracker's Reach.
增加该技能的最大距离。
Reduces the Cooldown of Tracker's Reach.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
Reduces the Cooldown of Tracker's Reach.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
Reduces the Cooldown of Tracker's Reach.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
Increases the maximum Range of Tracker's Reach.
增加该技能的最大距离。
Tracker's Reach converts Weapon Physical Damage to Frost Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
追捕者之触将武器物理伤害转化为冰霜伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Etheliel constructed icy replicas of herself so that she might be able to enjoy her own beauty too. These constructs were called the Mirrormaids. When Sarisel staked out her palace, hunting for dissident Primordials, Etheliel was long gone. It was a Mirrormaid who shattered at the impact of the grappling hook Kirenas, and she in turn left a lasting chill on Kirenas.
耶特利尔为自己制作了冰冷的复制品，这样她就可以享受自己的美丽。这些结构体被称为镜子侍女。在萨利塞尔为了狩猎造反的原初神监视她的宫殿时，就有一名镜子侍女在基勒纳斯钩爪的冲击下粉碎了，而她又给基勒纳斯留下了持久的寒意。
Tracker's Reach converts Weapon Physical Damage to Aether Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
追捕者之触将武器物理伤害转化为以太伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The Weave of Time, once a splendid tapestry, is little more than a patchwork rag these days. Once, it split in half; history stopped. All that remained were two still images: a past of archaic practices and forgotten heroes, and a future of magitechnology and dying worlds. Sarisel used his hook Kirenas to stitch the Weave of Time back together through its center: the present.
时间之纱，曾经是一块华丽的织帷，如今只不过是一块拼凑而成的破布。曾经，它一分为二；历史停止了。剩下的只有两幅静止的画面：一边是由古老的习俗和被遗忘的英雄构成的过去，另一边是由魔法技术和临终世界勾勒的未来。萨里塞尔用他的钩爪基勒纳斯将时间之纱缝合在它的中心：现在。
Increases the Attack Speed of Tracker's Reach.
该技能的攻击速度提高。
Bleeding Edge converts Weapon Physical Damage to Rend Damage.
回旋血刃将武器物理伤害转化为撕裂伤害。
Increases Bleeding Edge's spin speed.\nReduces the Damage dealt by the Skill.
提高血刃的旋转速度。\n降低该技能造成的伤害。
Increases Bleeding Edge's Area of Effect.
增加该技能的作用范围。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of Bleeding Edge.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
After Bleeding Edge is used, the axe continues to spin for a longer duration.
该技能被施放后，血刃会持续旋转更久。

Ashkadi is designed to upset the natural order, which in return reacts the only way it knows: by trying to adjust itself. The energy deployed by natural laws to fix the unbalance is what fuels the spin. With sufficient expertise, the axe-thrower can keep it spinning in a way that defies gravity itself.
阿什卡迪被设计用来扰乱自然秩序，而自然秩序唯一做出回应的方式便是：试图自我调整。被自然法则调动来修复失衡的能量是推动旋转的动力。如果有足够的专业知识，掷斧者可以使它以一种不受重力影响的方式旋转。
Bleeding Edge converts Weapon Physical Damage to Fire Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
回旋血刃将武器物理伤害转化为火焰伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Ezaneal, Fallen Lord of Trickery, has always been Hephaäron's rival in terms of craftmanship and creativity. That rivalry led him to break into the Armory of Creation and steal Ashkadi to understand and further the design. He convinced Abanazaar, the fallen Lord of Envy, to imbue the blade with ethereal fire. Ashkadi was later recovered but the design was tainted forever.
伊查内亚，堕落的诡计之王，在工艺和创造力方面总是能与赫法耶博一较高下。而这种较量促使他闯入造物武库，偷走阿什卡迪以了解它并进一步进行设计。他说服了堕落的嫉妒之王，阿巴纳扎，让他将超凡之火灌注到斧刃之中。后来阿什卡迪被找到了，但是已被永久地污染。
Increases your Life Leech while dealing Damage with Bleeding Edge.
血刃造成伤害时提高你的吸血。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of Bleeding Edge.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Allows Bleeding Edge to remain at your current location as you move around.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
允许血刃跟随你移动。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Hephaäron did not only observe the trajectory of celestial bodies, he tailed one for an unreasonable amount of time, learning and mastering every aspect of its elliptic journey. Only then, did he start imagining Ashkadi's design, aiming to reproduce its graceful trajectory in a small object.
赫法耶博不仅观察天体的轨迹，而且花费了超乎想象的时间尾随一个天体，学习和掌握其椭圆旅程的方方面面。直到那时，他才开始构思阿什卡迪的设计，以期使在微小的物体上再现那优美的轨迹。
The radius of Bleeding Edge's spinning circle increases over time.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
血刃的旋转的半径逐渐扩大。\n提高该技能的基础伤害。
You can use Bleeding Edge on the targeted location.
该技能可以被施放到指定位置。
Increases the Damage dealt by Bleeding Edge for every Ailment Stack an Enemy has.
敌人身上每有一层异常状态，该技能对其造成的伤害就会获得一定提升。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt by Bleeding Edge.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt by Ailments applied with Bleeding Edge.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt by Bleeding Edge.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Increases the Damage dealt by Bleeding Edge.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Reduces the Resource Cost of Bleeding Edge.
降低该技能的资源消耗。
Bleeding Edge converts Weapon Physical Damage to Sacred Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
回旋血刃将武器物理伤害转化为神圣伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Hephäaron presented Ashkadi to Anathëa and Moros both ; the weapon increased the power of the wielder while spinning forward, and restored natural balance upon spinning back to the owner. It made sense to him that Dusk and Dawn should both wield Ashkadi in equal parts. When Anathëa threw Ashkadi, the axe enhanced her sacred power, and when it swung back it called on a long cold night. Moros used that long night as an opening to strike the Malhems.
赫法耶博把阿什卡迪送给了安娜蒂亚和摩洛斯；武器在向前旋转时增加持用者的力量，并在旋转飞回主人身边时恢复自然平衡。在他看来，黄昏和黎明应该使用阿什卡迪的时间应该相等。当安娜蒂亚掷出阿什卡迪时，斧头增强了她的神圣力量，当它回击时，它召唤了一个漫长的寒冷的夜晚。摩洛斯利用那漫长的夜晚作为攻击马尔海姆的机会。
Bleeding Edge converts Weapon Physical Damage to Shadow Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
回旋血刃将武器物理伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Anathëa and Moros both wielded Ashkadi: an axe which enhanced the power of the wielder while creating a natural counterbalance as a price for that boon. Moros infiltrated a Malhem encampment using Ashkadi to create an artificial night by throwing the axe through the camp ; when the axe swung back, it radiated a blast of light as a counter, turning the Malhems to dust.
安娜蒂亚和摩洛斯共同持有阿什卡迪：一把斧头，它增强了持用者的力量，同时制造一种自然的平衡，以此来换取这种恩惠。摩洛斯潜入了一处马尔海姆营地，将阿什卡迪抛出，让它穿过营地制造了一个人工的黑夜；当斧头回摆时，它发出一道强光作为冲抵，把那里的马尔海姆人化作了光尘。
Increases the Damage dealt by Bleeding Edge.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Annihilation converts Weapon Physical Damage to Aether Damage.
湮灭将武器物理伤害转化为以太伤害。
Reduces the Resource Cost of Annihilation.
降低该技能的资源消耗。
Increases the Damage dealt by Annihilation.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Annihilation is able to Pierce Enemies.\nReduces the Damage dealt by the Skill.
光束能穿透敌人。\n降低该技能造成的伤害。

In his madness, Anulai-Tai feels all the movements in the world and their destructive nature, like a fuzzy haze of blasphemy toward Creation. His gaze punctures through that haze, piercing space and flesh, seeking for targets to single out and lay to rest.
在疯狂中，阿努莱-泰感受到了世界上所有的运动和它们的破坏本质，仿佛看到了一片亵渎造物的朦胧阴霾。他的目光穿透了那片阴霾，刺穿了空间和血肉，寻找着需要剔除的目标。
Annihilation converts Weapon Physical Damage to Toxic Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
湮灭将武器物理伤害转化为毒素伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Unlike Anulai-Tai, Bezeriel is not unnerved by the passage of time. The Fallen Archduke of Doom is only conscious of his hunger. Everything around him; his cultists, the other Abbathus, even the decomposing flesh he consumes, suffers over time, but not him. He thrives off of the decay, a scavenger of life and a timeless acquaintance of the Fallen Duke of Infinity.
与阿努莱-泰不同的是，贝泽瑞尔并不会因为时间的流逝而感到恐慌。这位堕落的毁灭大公只在意他的饥饿。他周围的一切；他的崇拜者，其余阿巴图斯领主，甚至他吞食的腐烂血肉，无不受到时间的侵蚀；而他除外。他从腐坏中茁壮成长，是生命的清道夫，是堕落的无限公爵永恒的朋友。
Increases your turn speed with Annihilation.
提高引导光束时的转向速度。
Increases the Tick Rate of Annihilation as it is being used.
伤害随引导时间逐渐提高。
Annihilation fires an additional beam.\nIncreases the Resource Cost of the Skill.
该技能额外发射一道光束。\n提高该技能的魔力消耗。

The cult of Infinity is a very dangerous one, their deadliest agents known as "Time Devourers", have specialized into isolating a foe from its normal bond to time, before discharging a tremendous amount of Aether unto the target. It accelerates its biorhythm so much that a mortal will grow old and die by the end of the channeling.
无限邪教极其危险，他们的最致命的特工被称为“时间吞食者”，专攻如何将敌人与时间的正常联系隔断，而后才是朝目标释放大量的以太。由于会大大加速生物节律，以至于凡人在引导结束时衰老乃至死去。
Using Annihilation grants a Buff to the Damage Type dealt by the Skill.\nAllies touched by the beam benefit from the same Damage Type Buff.
使用该技能会授予一个额外伤害Buff，额外伤害类型与该技能一致。\n被射线波及的盟友也会获得相同伤害类型的Buff。
Annihilation fires an additional beam.\nReduces the Damage dealt by the Skill.
技能额外发射一道光束。\n降低该技能造成的伤害。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of Annihilation.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of Annihilation.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt by Ailments applied with Annihilation.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt by Annihilation.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt by Annihilation.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Reduces the Resource Cost of Annihilation.
降低该技能的资源消耗。
Annihilation converts Weapon Physical Damage to Fire Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
湮灭将武器物理伤害转化为火焰伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

While Anulai-Tai is painfully aware of the future, Abanazaar is aware only of the present. A creature of desire that seeks instant satisfaction, his way of being is one that denies time itself. In a way, this self-centered hedonism protects him from Anulai-Tai’s power. His fiery instincts are stoked into uncontrolled and unmeasured blasts. He considers neither cause nor consequence; self-examination would only get in the way of his devices.
当阿努莱-泰痛苦地望向未来时，阿巴纳扎只看得到现在。作为一个欲望的生物，他寻求即时的满足，他的存在方式就是否认时间本身。在某种程度上，这种以自我为中心的享乐主义保护他不受阿努莱-泰的影响。他火热的本能被激发成不受控制和无法度量的爆炸。他既不考虑原因也不考虑后果；自省只会妨碍他的手段。
Annihilation converts Weapon Physical Damage to Sacred Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
湮灭将武器物理伤害转化为神圣伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The Weave of Time was created to provide a stable environment for the First Men to thrive. As the Weave deteriorated along with Anulai-Tai’s fevered mind, the Primordials took drastic measures to counteract the damage. Anathëa led a group, creating a single beam of Primordial Energy to infuse into Wolcen. This would strengthen the world’s material resistance against the whims of time. But for how long?
时间之纱被创造出来是为了给初代人类提供一个稳定的环境茁壮成长。当时之纱随着阿努莱-泰狂热的心智而恶化时，原初神采取了激烈的措施来抵消损害。安娜蒂亚领导了一个小组，创造了一束光束，将原初能量注入Wolcen。这能增强物质对时间侵蚀的抵抗力。但是这能支撑多久呢？
Increases the Damage dealt by Annihilation.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Wings of Ishmir deals Damage based on your Weapon Damage.
伊什米尔之翼造成的伤害基于你的武器伤害。
Increases the Rage generated with Wings of Ishmir.
增加该技能生成的怒气。
Increases the speed of Wings of Ishmir.
Stuns Enemies Hit by Wings of Ishmir.
击晕该技能命中的敌人。
A shockwave is created after Wings of Ishmir's landing that deals Damage to Enemies within its Area of Effect.
落地时产生一个造成范围伤害的冲击波。

Baäpheth, former Primordial of Ambition, had a single training session with Ishmir. In the midst of the fight, he threw it with such power that it fended an entire mountain. Since then, the earth itself reacts strongly whenever The First Spear touches the ground.
拜费特，曾经的野心之源，曾用伊什米尔进行过一个阶段的训练。在那次战斗中，他掷出伊什米尔的力量是如此之大，以至于轰平了一整座山。从那是起，每当第一枪触地，大地本身就会有强烈的反应。
Wings of Ishmir converts Weapon Physical Damage to Sacred Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
伊什米尔之翼将武器物理伤害转化为神圣伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Hephaäron forged magical neck rings for Anathëa, the Lady of Dawn. With them, her voice of pure light was imbued and became the Searing Song, allowing her to pierce the darkest nights. In return she gave him a single bright smile, which he immortalized by infusing its sacred shimmer into the blade of Ishmir.
赫法耶博为黎明女神，安娜蒂亚铸造了神奇的颈圈。有了他们，她那注入纯净之光的声音变成了灼热之歌，能够穿透最深沉的黑夜。作为回报，她给了他一个灿烂的微笑，他将这微笑中神圣的微光注入了伊什米尔的刀锋，使之得以不朽。
Increases the Damage dealt by Wings of Ishmir.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Nearby Enemies are Knocked Back when they are Hit with Wings of Ishmir.
该技能会击退命中的敌人。
The Cooldown of Wings of Ishmir is removed.\nEach use now costs one Stamina Point.
该技能不再消耗怒气。\n每次使用消耗一点耐力点。

The sight of the spear's head piercing the flesh, the painful deathrattle of the skewered foe, its warm blood splattering the face of the impaler: madmen and berserkers thirst for these grim sights to create an unstoppable momentum of destruction.
矛头刺穿了血肉，被串起的敌人的痛不欲生，温热的鲜血溅到了持矛者的脸上：疯子和狂战士渴望这幅可怕的景象所创造的不可阻挡的毁灭之势。
Reduces the Cooldown of Wings of Ishmir per Enemy that it kills.
该技能每次击杀敌人都会缩短其冷却时间。
A vortex pulls in Enemies at the targeted location before Wings of Ishmir lands.
落地前在目标位置制造一个牵引敌人的漩涡。

In his single training session with Ishmir, Baäpheth caused more chaos yet. While practicing his form, he swung it through the air with such power that a cyclone gathered from his movement, and in the moment he released the spear in a mighty throw, lightning made a deep scar in the earth in the shape of a seemingly bottomless gulf. Like the earth, the air remains sensitive to The First Spear's flight.
仅仅是拿伊什米尔练手，拜费特就造成了更多混乱。他圆舞长矛，磅礴的力量带起一道旋风，就在他用力投掷长矛的一刹那，一道闪电在地上留下了一道深深的伤疤，就像一个深不见底的深渊。大地和空气仿佛至今对它心有余悸。
Force Shield is regenerated per Enemy Hit by Wings of Ishmir.
该技能击中每个敌人都会为你回复护盾。
Gives a Damage Buff per Enemy Hit by Wings of Ishmir.
落地时每击中一个敌人都会提供一层伤害Buff。
Wings of Ishmir gives a Damage Buff to you and your Allies within the landing's Area of Effect.
伊什米尔之翼会授予你和作用范围内的盟友一个伤害Buff。
Increases the Critical Chance of Wings of Ishmir.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of Wings of Ishmir.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Threat generated by Wings of Ishmir.
增加该技能产生的仇恨值。
Wings of Ishmir converts Weapon Physical Damage to Rend Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
伊什米尔之翼将武器物理伤害转化为撕裂伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

There was once only one ocean covering much of Wolcen. The ocean was arrogant, and asserted to Baäpheth, Primordial of Ambition, that it was equal to any Primordial in importance. Baäpheth was infuriated and cast the lance Ishmir down on the ocean so hard that it split into many smaller seas. These smaller seas bled into rivers, and those rivers into creeks. The water still yearns for its former wholeness of body, and one day will reform.
曾经只有一片海洋，它覆盖了Wolcen世界的大部分地区。海洋是傲慢的，并断言拜费特，野心之源，在重要性上和其他原初神别无二致。拜费特被激怒了，把伊什米尔长矛重重地扔到海里，使它碎裂了许多较小的海洋。这些较小的海洋流入河流，而这些河流分出小溪。水仍然渴望它以前完整的身体，它总有一天会重组。
Wings of Ishmir converts Weapon Physical Damage to Frost Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
伊什米尔之翼将武器物理伤害转化为冰霜伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

When the United Republic of Mankind began purging magic users, a group of Cultists of Vanity took refuge in the temple of Harshev. Fearing the republicans, they broke Etheliel’s taboo and forged ice weapons to defend themselves. Etheliel’s punishment was swift: she warped the sorcerers into mindless servants and changed their appearance to suit her refined tastes. Yet even now, the ghouls of Harshev still have an unbreakable stronghold within the Republic.
当人类联邦共和国开始清除魔法使用者时，一群虚荣邪教徒躲在哈舍夫神庙避难。由于害怕共和国人，他们打破了耶特利尔的禁忌，制造了寒冰武器用以自卫。耶特利尔的惩罚很快降临：她把巫师们变成了没有神智的仆从，并改变了他们的外貌以适应她高雅的品味。即便是现在，哈舍夫的食尸鬼在共和国内仍然有一个牢不可破的据点。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt by Wings of Ishmir.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Wrath of Baäpheth deals Damage based on your Weapon Damage.
拜费特之怒造成的伤害基于你的武器伤害。
Reduces the Resource Cost of Wrath of Baäpheth.
降低该技能的资源消耗。
Increases the Damage dealt by Wrath of Baäpheth.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Increases Wrath of Baäpheth's Area of Effect.
增加该技能的作用范围。
Increases your Life Leech while dealing Damage with Wrath of Baäpheth.\nLife Leech increases the lower your Health is.
该技能造成的伤害获得额外吸血。\n你的生命值越低，获得的吸血越高。

After a close battle with Anathëa, Baäpheth was bound in chains made by Hephaäron and imprisoned in the camp of the Army of Genesis. The War of the Primordials raged in the distance as Baäpheth tried to regain his strength. While the chains were unbreakable, the wall was not, and Baäpheth saw that there was a chance to escape. With every struggle freedom felt slightly closer, reviving his strength with every exertion, until the wall collapsed.
在与安娜蒂亚近距离的战斗之后，拜费特被用赫法耶博打造的锁链绑住，囚禁在天启军团的营地里。当拜费特试图回复自己力量的时候，原初神战在远处激烈地进行。虽然锁链牢不可破，但墙却不是，拜费特看到了逃脱的希望。每挣扎一次，自由就近上一点，他的力量随着他的每次努力焕发出来，直到束缚他的那堵墙倒塌。
Wrath of Baäpheth converts Weapon Physical Damage to Sacred Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
拜费特之怒将武器物理伤害转化为神圣伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

When Baäpheth was captured by Anathëa and her Army of Genesis, the guards could not hold him long. A regiment of them rushed to his captivity chamber after hearing a commotion. Baäpheth swung wildly with his shackled arm and the chain cut clean through the first soldier’s armored torso. An arrogant smirk spread across Baäpheth’s face as he wrapped the chains around his hands.
拜费特终于挣脱了束缚，他虚弱无力、伤痕累累、手无寸铁。一队卫兵听到异动，冲进囚禁他的房间。拜费特疯狂地挥舞他带着镣铐的手臂，带头的士兵覆盖着装甲的躯干被锁链直接削成两截。当拜费特把锁链裹在手上，一个傲慢的微笑在他的脸上蔓延。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of Wrath of Baäpheth.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt by Wrath of Baäpheth.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
An additional attack is added to Wrath of Baäpheth's combo.
在该技能的连击中额外增加一次攻击。
When used, Wrath of Baäpheth grants a Life Leech Buff to you and nearby Allies.
施放该技能时，授予你和附近的盟友一个吸血buff。
You generate Rage when an Enemy is killed with Wrath of Baäpheth.
该技能击杀敌人时生成怒气。
Increases the Damage dealt by Wrath of Baäpheth based on your missing Health. The bonus grows stronger the lower your health is.
基于已损失生命的量提升伤害。

A whirlwind of death, Baäpheth struck fear into the hearts of the Army of Genesis. Every shriek and deathrattle transferred sacred energy gifted by Lady of Dawn to the enraged Primordial of Ambition. He feasted on this power, using it to eviscerate every obstacle between him and his adversary. He stood in the face of Anathëa, coated in gore and with madness in his eyes, ready to tear her to shreds with the chains she used to imprison him and the Sacred strength of her own army.
在死亡的旋风中，拜费特将恐惧带入了天启军团的心中。每一次尖叫和临终得哀鸣，都让黎明女神所赐予的神圣能量被怒意升腾的野心之源所汲取。他享用着这份力量，用它来扫除他和对手之间的一切障碍。他站在安娜蒂亚面前，脸上充满了血腥和疯狂，准备用她过去囚禁他的锁链和她自己军队的神圣力量将她撕成碎片。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of Wrath of Baäpheth.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt by Ailments applied with Wrath of Baäpheth.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt by Wrath of Baäpheth.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Increases the Attack Speed of Wrath of Baäpheth.
提高该技能的攻击速度。
Increases the Damage dealt by Wrath of Baäpheth.\nReduces the Critical Chance Score of the Skill.
提高该技能造成的伤害。\n\n降低该技能的暴击几率值。
Wrath of Baäpheth converts Weapon Physical Damage to Lightning Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
拜费特之怒将武器物理伤害转化为闪电伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

When Baäpheth escaped captivity at the hands of the Army of Genesis, he made contact with Beelmalik and asked him to remove the broken chains around his wrists. Beelmalik’s attempts could not move the shackles. They only left the chains imbued with electric power. Baäpheth thanked him all the same: if he could not cast off this mark of past weakness, he could use it to bolster victories to come.
拜费特逃脱了天启军团地俘虏后，他与比马利克取得了联系，并请求他解开自己手腕上的断链。比马利克的尝试并未撼动枷锁。只留下充满电能的锁链。拜费特同样感谢他：如果他不能摆脱过去的弱点，他可以用它来巩固未来的胜利。
Wrath of Baäpheth converts Weapon Physical Damage to Aether Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
拜费特之怒将武器物理伤害转化为以太伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

With the Fallen organized into a militarized effort, Anulai-Tai led an offensive on the Primordial Lady of Dawn. He wielded his power over time at the opportune moment ; as Anathëa rose to strike him with the dawn of a radiant sun, Anulai-Tai aged that sun into a mere red star, weaker yet more volatile. And so he began the duel with the advantage.
随着堕落者组织成一个军事化的努力，阿努莱-泰领导了一波针对黎明女神的进攻。他在适当的时刻，他挥舞着他推移时间的力量；当安娜蒂亚站起来，用一轮灿烂的太阳向他袭来时，阿努莱-泰把太阳老化成了一颗红巨星，更弱且更不稳定。于是他籍此优势开始了决斗。
Increases the Damage dealt by Wrath of Baäpheth.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Bulwark of Dawn converts Weapon Physical Damage to Sacred Damage.
黎明壁垒将武器物理伤害转化为神圣伤害。
Increases the Duration of Bulwark of Dawn.\nIncreases the Resource Cost of the Skill.
延长该技能的持续时间。\n该技能消耗的资源增加。
While inside Bulwark of Dawn's Area of Effect, you gain an All Resistances Score Buff.
处于光阵内时，你会获得一个全抗值Buff。
While inside Bulwark of Dawn's Area of Effect, your Attacks deal additional Damage as Sacred Damage.
处于光阵内时，你的攻击造成额外神圣伤害。
You can use Bulwark of Dawn on the targeted location.
该技能可以被施放到指定位置。

The Lady of Dawn is a benevolent Primordial who defends Creation against the Fallen. She rules over the concepts of Dawn, Hope, Truth and Rebirth. She tries to shepherd mankind into her humbling light while giving it the powers to survive against supernatural invasions.
黎明女神是一位仁慈的原初神，她保护造物对抗堕落者。她掌管着黎明、希望、真理和重生的概念。她试图引领人类进入她的谦卑之光，同时赋予它抵抗超凡侵害的生存能力。
Bulwark of Dawn's Area of Effect can be moved by using the Skill again while it is active.
光阵存在时，可以通过重新施放该技能来移动它。

Facing the injustice and perils of the world, some have lost faith in Anathëa's existence on the claim that through recorded history, she never intervened herself to help Creation. Some Brothers chose to fight off this faithlessness by becoming "Hierophants of the Searing Song", battlepriests that preach her prayers and blessings to shield mankind from evil.
面对世界上的不公和危险，一些人对安娜蒂亚的存在失去了信心，声称根据历史记载，她从未出手帮助人类。一些兄弟会成员选择通过成为“灼热之歌的圣者”来战胜这种不忠，他们是宣讲她的祷言和福音来保护人类免于邪恶侵袭的战地牧师。
Increases the Healing Rate of Bulwark of Dawn.
提高黎明壁垒的治疗速率。
While inside Bulwark of Dawn's Area of Effect, your Stamina Regeneration is increased.
处于黎明壁垒的覆盖范围内时，你的耐力回复会得到提高。
Bulwark of Dawn's Area of Effect follows the player it was used on.
黎明壁垒会跟随被作为目标施放的玩家移动。

The Brotherhood of Dawn worships Anathëa. Even after being chased from the Kingdom of Alia once the United Republic of Mankind took over, they stayed true to their oaths and remained powerful knights, shielding innocents from the terrors of the night.
黎明的兄弟会崇拜安娜蒂亚。即使在人类联邦共和国接替了阿里亚王国之后，他们遭到驱逐，但他们依旧忠于誓言，并且仍然是将无辜之人从黑夜的恐惧中解救出来的强大骑士。
While inside Bulwark of Dawn's Area of Effect, your Ailment Chance Score is increased.
处于黎明壁垒的覆盖范围内时，你的异常状态几率值获得加成。
Bulwark of Dawn's Area of Effect deals Damage.
黎明壁垒的覆盖区域会造成伤害。
While inside Bulwark of Dawn's Area of Effect, your Force Shield regenerates.
处于黎明壁垒的覆盖范围内时，你的护盾会得到回复。
Reduces the Cooldown of Bulwark of Dawn.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
Increases the Healing Rate of Bulwark of Dawn.
提高黎明壁垒的治疗速率。
Reduces the Resource Cost of Bulwark of Dawn.
降低该技能的资源消耗。
Increases the amount of Health regenerated by Bulwark of Dawn's Tick.
提高该技能治疗效果每跳恢复的生命值。
Increases the Duration of Bulwark of Dawn.
延长该技能的持续时间。
Bulwark of Dawn converts Weapon Physical Damage to Fire Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
黎明壁垒将武器物理伤害转化为火焰伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Both Primordials and First Men were quick to dismiss Abanazaar as a patron of wanton destruction and childish desires. But those that worship him see something else. They are largely those who work the land: they invite his flames to heal over-plowed fields, ridding them of parasites and fertilizing the ground with ash. Who could embody nature better than Abanazaar, he who follows his animalistic drives without shame, head held high?
原初神和初代人类很快就都把阿巴那扎视为肆意破坏和幼稚欲望的惯犯。但是那些崇拜他的人看到了别的东西。他们主要是那些在土地上耕作的人：他们邀请他的火焰在犁过的土地上疗伤，除去寄生虫，并用灰烬使土地肥沃。谁能比昂首挺胸、毫无羞耻地追随原始欲望的阿巴那扎更能体现自然呢？
Bulwark of Dawn converts Weapon Physical Damage to Shadow Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
黎明壁垒将武器物理伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The Brotherhood of Dawn holds a special ceremony for prayer at sunrise. The dawn is held sacred. This is not only because it’s the moment where light ushers darkness away, but also because it’s a symbol of the two lovers Anathëa and Moros meeting. The Hierophants who pray at this moment of day may find that their sacred power mingles with a soothing shadow.
黎明兄弟会在日出时举行特别的祈祷仪式。黎明是神圣的。这不仅是因为这是光明将黑暗引开的时刻，也是因为这是安娜蒂亚和摩洛斯两位情人相遇的象征。在每天的这一刻祈祷的祭司会发现他们的神圣力量与一个抚慰人心的阴影混合在一起。
Stings of Krearion deals Damage based on your Weapon Damage.
科瑞里昂的蛰刺造成的伤害基于你的武器伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt by Stings of Krearion.
提高该技能的武器伤害倍率。
Reduces the Resource Cost of Stings of Krearion.
降低该技能的资源消耗。
Reduces the number of Projectiles launched by Stings of Krearion.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
该技能发射的投射物数量减少。\n\n提高该技能造成的伤害。
Projectiles launched by Stings of Krearion explode when they Hit an Enemy, dealing Damage in an Area of Effect.\nStings of Krearion no longer Pierces.
该技能发射的投射物命中敌人时爆炸。\n移除该技能的穿透效果。

While Hephaäron built Krearion, his apprentice was in charge of creating its arrows. He experimented with the design, and decided on an explosive arrowhead as standard. Hephaäron was furious and claimed that the apprentice was unable to understand the purity of his design. Such crass, mindless violence contrasts with Hephaäron’s finely crafted weapons that carried out their function efficiently and with simplicity. This disagreement was the first step towards eccentricity that led Ezaneal to be the devious inventor he is today.
赫法耶博打造科瑞里昂时，他的徒弟负责制造它的箭。他对设计进行了试验，并决定采用一种爆炸箭头作为标准配备。赫法耶博大发雷霆，声称徒弟无法理解他设计的纯洁性。这种粗暴的、无意识的暴力与赫法耶博精心制作的武器相比，它们简单有效地实现了它们的功能。这种分歧是导致伊查内亚脾气变得古怪，以至于成为如今的欺诈发明家的第一步。
Stings of Krearion converts Weapon Physical Damage to Toxic Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
科瑞里昂的蛰刺将武器物理伤害转化为毒素伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The bow is the most common weapon for hunters in the cult of Bezeriel. As they collect flesh for him to consume, yanking out the arrows from the corpses, the arrowheads become more and more putrid as the gory residue builds up between each kill. It rots over time, making each shot ever more lethal.
弓是贝泽瑞尔邪教中的猎人们最常用的武器。当他们收集血肉供贝泽瑞尔食用前，会从尸体上拔出箭，随着每一次杀戮间血迹的积累，箭头变得越来越腐臭。它持续的腐烂，让每次射击都更加致命。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of Stings of Krearion.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Additional Projectiles are launched by Stings of Krearion.
Stings of Krearion creates phantom archers that will launch Projectiles alongside you.
该技能会召唤幻影射手与你并肩射击。
Gives a chance to create a ghost that inflicts one additional Hit to the Enemy Hit by Stings of Krearion.
使用该技能击中敌人时有几率生成一个幽灵盟友，对其进行一次额外打击。
Increases your Attack Speed with Stings of Krearion.
提高该技能的攻击速度。
Increases the Damage dealt by each of Stings of Krearion's Projectiles based on their remaining Pierce Strength.
根据该技能投射物剩余的穿透强度提供伤害加成。
Stings of Krearion's keybind can be held down to queue arrow volleys that will be launched successively when the keybind is released.
允许在施放时长按该技能来进行蓄力，每达到一个蓄力等级释放时就会多进行一波射击。

The creation of Krearion served as inspiration for all humans to create their own bows. As archery became more widespread, Krearion gathered power within itself, which cried out in great volleys. For every bow strung, Krearion’s shadow is cast wider and longer than ever.
科瑞里昂的创造为所有人类创造自己的弓提供了灵感。随着弓箭的普及，科瑞里昂也在其内部聚集着倾泻无双箭雨力量。每有一把弓被拉开，科瑞里昂投下的阴影都比过去更宽更远。
Stings of Krearion converts Weapon Physical Damage to Frost Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
科瑞里昂的蛰刺将武器物理伤害转化为冰霜伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Those wanderers from the most hostile regions of Varg speak of a legend. A lone wandering figure in furs, whose arrows turn their target into statues of ice. Some believe him an envoy of a higher power. Others still believe that his arrows are the product of some advanced craft, and that his technique might be uncovered if one adventures far enough into his territory.
那些来自与法吉对立最严重地区的流浪者讲述了一个传说。有一个穿着毛皮的孤独流浪者，他的箭会把目标冻成冰雕。有人认为他是高等势力的使者。其他人则仍然相信他的箭是某种先进工艺的产物，如果有人冒险深入他的领地到一定程度，说不定就能揭露他技术的秘密。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt by Ailments applied with Stings of Krearion.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of Stings of Krearion.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt by Stings of Krearion.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Stings of Krearion converts Weapon Physical Damage to Sacred Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
科瑞里昂的蛰刺将武器物理伤害转化为神圣伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

When the Republic took ownership of the Kingdom of Alia, the Brotherhood of Dawn found itself criminalized overnight. Thus began a mass exodus of Daybreakers, with the Trailblazers at their head; these rangers wielded the power of dawn at the tip of their arrows, lighting their brethren’s way through hostile lands. They carved out the path to new homes for the Lady, and remain the sole guides able to find these refuges.
当共和国夺取了阿利亚王国的政权，黎明兄弟会发现自己一夜之间就被定罪了。于是，破晓者们开始了大规模的逃亡，开拓者们一马当先；这些游骑兵在他们的箭尖上挥舞着黎明的力量，照亮了兄弟们穿越敌人领土的道路。他们为女神开辟了通往新家的道路，他们也是仍然是唯一能够找到这些避难所的向导。
Stings of Krearion converts Weapon Physical Damage to Fire Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
科瑞里昂的蛰刺将武器物理伤害转化为火焰伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The word held most sacred by the Cult of the Avaricious is “Satisfaction”. Any resource desired must be had. Any offence, however mild, must be avenged. A fire must spread. When the Cult moves against its enemies, they aim for total destruction, without concern for tomorrow’s alliances. Flaming arrows scratch orange lines into the sky, and when they land, the thatch roofs of the city below turn into an overwhelming blaze.
贪欲邪教徒认为最神圣的词是“满足”。任何想要的资源都必须拥有。任何冒犯，无论多么轻微，都必须报仇。火必须蔓延。当邪教与敌人对抗时，他们的目标是彻底毁灭，而不关心明天的联盟。燃烧的箭划破天空勾勒出橘黄色的线，当它们落下时，下方城市的茅草屋顶便燃起一场势不可挡的大火。
Increases the Damage dealt by Stings of Krearion.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Increases Stings of Krearion's Projectiles Pierce Strength by 1.
该技能的投射物穿透强度+1。
Aether Jump converts Weapon Physical Damage to Aether Damage if it can deal Damage.
以太穿越造成伤害时，将武器物理伤害转化为以太伤害。
Increases the maximum Range of Aether Jump.
Applies Aether Jump's Damage Type Ailment to Enemies near the beginning and end of the teleport.
对传送起点和终点附近的敌人施加与以太穿越伤害类型对应的异常状态。
You generate Willpower for each Enemy you travel through with Aether Jump.
传送时从你每穿过一个敌人都会生成一定的魔力。
Enemies around the targeted location swap locations with you when using Aether Jump.
传送时与指定位置附近的敌人交换位置。

After a certain threshold, mastering the Aether drifts in focus. The temptation to use it to reshape the world becomes irresistible, regardless of the risks of butterfly effect. Manipulating it from afar and remoulding the thread that connects every being to it becomes a nefarious call that eventually leads to a failing moral system and a predatory behaviour to toy with one's prey in the pursuit of selfish desires.
超过一定的阈值之后，对以太的掌握会趋于聚焦。利用它重塑世界的诱惑会变得不可抵挡，到那时将会枉顾蝴蝶效应的风险。从远方操纵以太和重塑万物与它相连的时间线，变成了一场罪恶的呼唤，最终导致的是在追求私欲的过程中玩弄猎物的失败道德体系和掠夺行为。
A Decoy that generates Threat is left at your starting location when you use Aether Jump.
当你完成一次传送时，会在原先的位置留下一个生成仇恨的诱饵。
Aether Jump deals Damage to Enemies between the start and end points of the teleport.\nIncreases the Ailment Chance Score of the Skill.
对传送起始点之间的敌人造成伤害。\n增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Using Aether Jump removes all Crowd Controls affecting you.
施放此技能将移除你受到的所有控制效果。
Reduces the Cooldown of Aether Jump.\nEach successive use has an increased Resource Cost within a certain timeframe.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。\n若施放间隔不足一定时间，则每次施放该技能消耗的魔力都会在上一次的基础上增加。

The most powerful sorcerers of the cult of Infinity aim to mimic their Fallen overlord. They have partially severed their link to time itself, allowing them to move through the Aether motionlessly at an uncanny speed.
无限教团中最强大的巫师们力求模仿他们的堕落主宰。他们已经切断了自身与时间的部分联系，这允许他们在静止状态下以不可思议的速度穿越以太。
Increases your Attack Speed and Spell Casting Speed after using Aether Jump.
使用该技能后攻击、施法速度提高。
If Aether Jump is used again within a certain timeframe, you will go back the start point of your previous teleport.\nReduces the Resource Cost of the Skill.
在一定时间内再次施放该技能会将你传送到你上次传送的起点。\n降低该技能的资源消耗。

Deconstructing time allows the possibility to create minor anomalies. To shape things in a way that should not be possible. Something even Primordials have trouble achieving is the teleportation recoil effect. The act of teleporting does not only consume energy: it condenses it in an unstable cluster, which may on implosion cause teleportation to recur a number of times, occasionally trapping the subject in an infinite loop.
解构时间允许微小异常产生的可能。以本应不可能的方式塑造事物。有些事情即使是原初者也会感到棘手，比如传送的折返效果。这种传送行为不仅仅是消耗能量：还将能量凝聚在一个不稳定的团簇中，正是团簇的内爆引起了传送的多次重复，偶尔也会令传送主体陷入无限循环。
Increases your Movement Speed after using Aether Jump.
施放该技能后提高你的移动速度。
Reduces the Resource Cost of Aether Jump.
降低该技能的资源消耗。
Reduces the Cooldown of Aether Jump.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
You generate Willpower for each Enemy you travel through with Aether Jump.
传送时你每穿过一个敌人都会生成一定的魔力。
Reduces the Resource Cost of Aether Jump.
降低该技能的资源消耗。
Increases the maximum Range of Aether Jump.
Aether Jump converts Weapon Physical Damage to Lightning Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
以太穿越将武器物理伤害转化为闪电伤害。\n\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The Weave of Time is entwined with Wolcen’s atmosphere. As such, the whims of time tend to affect meteorological behaviours as well. Before Beelmalik can redeem himself for the crimes that turned him into an Abbathu, he must find some way to extract his domain from Anulai-Tai’s influence. In the meanwhile, he makes use of their proximity, employing Anulai-Tai’s paradoxes for his own ends.
时间之纱与Wolcen的大气交织在一起。因此，时间的变化也会影响气象活动。在比马利克能够赎罪之前，他必须找到一些方法从阿努莱-泰的影响中夺回自己的领地。同时，他也通过他们之间的关联性，利用阿努莱-泰的悖论来达到自己的目的。
Aether Jump converts Weapon Physical Damage to Shadow Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
以太穿越将武器物理伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

There was an era called the Boundless Dusk, in which Moros took Anulai-Tai’s place at the center of the Weave of Time. Moros experienced all of his son’s pain, but also discovered the omnipresence that came with it. Black silhouettes appeared all over Wolcen during that century: Moros was everywhere and nowhere at once, unable to control the weave. Reluctantly, Anulai-Tai returned to the duty that would eventually drive him mad.
曾有一个时代被称做无边的黄昏，在那个时代，摩洛斯接替了阿努莱-泰于时间之纱中心的位置。摩洛斯经历了他儿子所有的痛苦，但也认识到随之而来的无所不在。在那个时代，整个Wolcen上都出现了黑色的剪影：摩洛斯无处不在又不在任何一处，他无法控制时间之纱。最后，阿努莱-泰迫不得已回到了终将让他发疯的岗位。
The "Avenger" Autoturret deals Damage based on your Weapon Damage.
“复仇者”自动炮台造成的伤害基于你的武器伤害。
Increases the Duration of the "Avenger" Autoturret.
Increases the Damage dealt by the "Avenger" Autoturret.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
An additional cannon is added to the "Avenger" Autoturret, allowing it to attack more frequently.
炮台获得一个额外炮口，允许它拥有更高的攻击频率。
The "Avenger" Autoturret deals damage in a cone shape in front of it.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
炮台对前方锥形范围造成伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

For a while there was harmony between the two groups, despite their differences. The agreement provided mutual security and allowed the city to prosper. However, discontent started brewing when The Cult of Beelmalik sabotaged some of the turrets, blaming shoddy craftsmanship and turning public opinion against the refugees. But the turrets remained, defending the city with complete neutrality.
尽管存在差异，但双方还算得上和谐。协议下形成的安全共同体使这座城市得以繁荣发展。然而，当比马利克的信徒故意破坏了一些炮塔，并将之当作工艺低劣的证据，让公众舆论的矛头指向难民时，矛盾便开始激化。但是炮塔仍然存在，以完全中立的方式保卫着这座城市。
The "Avenger" Autoturret converts Weapon Physical Damage to Lightning Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
“复仇者”自动炮台将武器物理伤害转化为闪电伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Long ago, there was an underground city of scholars and craftsmen. However, it was constantly threatened by their fellow subterranean settlers, the Svriir. A group of refugees, followers of Ezaneal, offered to build defences for the city in exchange for shelter and tributes to the Fallen Lord of Trickery. A deal was struck, and the cultists constructed automatic turrets to protect the city.
很久以前，有一座属于学者和工匠的地下城。然而，它不断受到同样定居地下的邻居：蜥怪的威胁。一群难民，伊查内亚的追随者，提出为城市建造防御设施，以换取庇护和献给堕落诡计之王的贡品。协议达成，教团成员建造了自动炮塔来保护这座城市。
The "Avenger" Autoturret explodes when it is destroyed, dealing Damage in an Area of Effect.
炮台自毁时会爆炸，造成范围伤害。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt by the "Avenger" Autoturret.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Allows the "Avenger" Autoturret to rotate and automatically target Enemies.
炮台能够转向并自动瞄准敌人。

Long ago, there was an underground city of scholars and craftsmen. It was constantly threatened by the Svriir who dominated their subterranean domains. A group of refugees, followers of Ezaneal, offered to build defences for the city in exchange for shelter and tributes to the Fallen Lord of Trickery. A deal was struck, and the cultists constructed automatic turrets to protect the city.
很久以前，有一座属于学者和工匠的地下城。但占据地下世界的蜥怪不断威胁着它的安全。一群难民，伊查内亚的追随者，提出为城市建造防御，以换取庇护和献给堕落诡计之王的贡品。协议达成，教团成员建造了自动炮塔来保护这座城市。
You can have two "Avenger" Autoturrets active simultaneously.\nReduces the Damage dealt by the Skill.
允许同时维持两个炮台的存在。\n降低该技能造成的伤害。
Increases the Movement Speed of your allies in an Area of Effect around the "Avenger" Autoturret.
提高炮台周围一定范围内的盟友的移动速度。
Creates a shield in front of the "Avenger" Autoturret that blocks incoming Projectiles.
在炮台面前生成一个护盾，阻挡来袭的投射物。

The tributes to Ezaneal slowed and soon stopped all together. The furious cultists precipitated a schism with the Cultists of Beelmalik. Each turned their faulty cannons towards each other and swore that their weapons would strike down the city’s enemies. Yet, there was no shot. The town remained paralyzed, each fearing that they would be the one struck down if fire broke out. Centuries after, the inhabitants still suspect that tomorrow will sound the crack of their mutual destruction.
对伊查内亚的供奉逐渐减少，很快就彻底停止。愤怒的伊查内亚信徒与比马利克的信徒产生了分裂。每个人都将有缺陷的大炮指向对方，并发誓他们的武器将会击倒城市的敌人。 尽管没有一声炮响，但整座城还是陷入了瘫痪，每个人都担心火并一旦爆发，自己就会被杀死。几个世纪之后，这里的居民仍然时刻怀疑他们的相互毁灭明天就会爆发。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of the "Avenger" Autoturret.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt by Ailments applied with the "Avenger" Autoturret.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt by the "Avenger" Autoturret.\nReduces the Duration of the turret.
提高该技能造成的伤害。\n\n降低炮台的存在时间。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of the "Avenger" Autoturret.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Reduces the Cooldown of the "Avenger" Autoturret.
缩短该技能的冷却时间。
The "Avenger" Autoturret converts Weapon Physical Damage to Fire Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
“复仇者”自动炮台将武器物理伤害转化为火焰伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

For a while, the citizens of the underground city threatened to withdraw worship of Beelmalik and Ezaneal until the cultists had resolved their conflict. This backfired; at the approach of a Svriir pack, the cultists refused to man their turrets. Civilians were left to make vulgar modifications, powered with fire and flint. When the walls were breached, so was their resolve.
有一段时间，这座地下城的居民威胁说他们将撤回对比马利克和以萨内尔的信仰直到教徒们解决他们的冲突。结果适得其反；在一群蜥怪接近时，教徒们拒绝为炮塔配备人手。居民们只能用火和燧石进行粗糙的改装。当城墙被攻破时，他们的决心也被攻破了。
The "Avenger" Autoturret converts Weapon Physical Damage to Shadow Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
“复仇者”自动炮台将武器物理伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Tired of depending on the cult of Ezaneal to wield their turrets, the city sought a new power source. The Dusk Creed modified a single prototype, allowing it to be fueled by the endless darkness of the Underground. But one night, as the artificial lights of the underground failed, the turret began overloading, spinning and shooting without pause. When the lights turned on again, a neighborhood of the city had been forever blotted in blackness.
厌倦了依靠伊查内亚的教徒来操纵他们的炮塔，这座城市开始寻找新的能量来源。黄昏信徒改造出一台原型机，让无尽的地下黑暗为它供能。但有一天晚上，由于地下的人造灯光失灵，炮塔开始超载，旋转射击个不停。当灯再次亮起时，这座城市的一个街区永远笼罩在黑暗中。
Increases the Damage dealt by the "Avenger" Autoturret.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Increases Rage generated per Enemy Hit by Sovereign Shout.\nIncreases Rage Generation while the Skill is active.
增加战吼击中每个敌人生成的怒气。\n在技能的持续时间内提高怒气生成。
Sovereign Shout deals part of your Weapon Damage with a high Life Leech value.
战吼造成你一定比例的武器伤害并自带高额吸血。
Sovereign Shout grants a Buff to your All Resistances Score based on the number of Enemies Hit by the Skill.
战吼授予你一个全抗值Buff，其效果取决于战吼击中的敌人数量。
Stuns Enemies within Sovereign Shout's Area of Effect.
战吼会对其作用范围内的敌人造成眩晕。

Baäpheth is a born conqueror. But far from being a mindless battlebeast, he turned out to be a patient strategist. He understands that battles are won long before soldiers ever set foot on the field. The successful belligerent breaks the will of his foes long before breaking their bones.
拜费特是天生的征服者。但他非但不是一个没有头脑的战斗野兽，反而是一个有耐心的战略家。他明白，战争取胜的关键往往在于士兵踏足战场之前。成功的交战者在打碎敌人的骨头之前很久就已经粉碎了他们的意志。
Sovereign Shout applies Weakness on Enemies within its Area of Effect.
战吼会对其作用范围内的敌人造成虚弱。
Increases the Duration of all Buffs granted by Sovereign Shout.
延长此技能赋予的所有Buff的持续时间。
Increases the effectiveness of all Buffs granted by Sovereign Shout.
增强所有战吼赋予的Buff的效果。
Sovereign Shout removes Crowd Controls affecting you and your Allies.
战吼会清除你和盟友受到的控制效果。

Before becoming the Fallen of War, Baäpheth used to be the Primordial of Ambition. Part of his hubris came from his willingness to embody the perfect warrior. To be a figure that others could look up to in their darkest times. When others would consider breaking the line, he would not relent and would command them to stand with him. Most would mistake his quest for glory for a heroism that never was.
在成为堕落战争大公之前，拜费特曾是野心之源。他傲慢的部分原因是他想表现成完美战士的意愿。做一个别人在最黑暗的时候都能仰望的人物。当别人考虑越过前线时，他不会允许，而是会命令他们和他站在一起。大多数人会把他追求荣誉的行为误认为是一种英雄主义，但其实那从来不是。
Sovereign Shout grants a Buff to your Life Leech.
战吼会授予你一个吸血Buff。
Sovereign Shout grants a Buff to your Block Chance.
战吼会授予你一个格挡率Buff。
Sovereign Shout grants a Buff to your Critical Chance Score.
战吼会授予你一个暴击几率值Buff。
Sovereign Shout grants a Buff to your Movement Speed.
战吼会授予你一个移动速度Buff。
Gives Sovereign Shout a chance to Frenzy Enemies. Frenzied Enemies can turn on each other.
战吼有几率使敌人狂乱。狂乱的敌人会转而互相攻击。

During the great War of the Primordials, Baäpheth engaged and fought against Anathëa, the Lady of Dawn. While The First Warrior's prowess could not be matched in battle, Anathëa's resisted his frenzying shouts and her raw power was still enough to rival him for a while. \n\nIn the end, Baäpheth had the upper hand and wounded Anathëa, some of her lights escaped her body uncontrollably, engulfing and searing Baäpheth inside and out. Both were considerably weakened by the experience and unable to land the final blow.
在原初神的大战之中，拜费特与黎明女神安娜蒂亚交战。虽然第一战士的高超战斗技艺无人能及，但安娜蒂亚的英勇令他的狂吼毫无建树，而且她的根源之力仍然足以与他匹敌片刻。 \n\n最后，拜费特占了上风，击伤了安娜蒂亚，她的一些光芒无法控制地从她身上逸出，淹没了拜费特，从内到外灼烧着他。两败俱伤的他们都无法对对方施以最后一击。
Bladestorm deals Damage based on your Weapon Damage.
剑刃风暴造成的伤害基于你的武器伤害。
Reduces the Resource Cost of Bladestorm.
降低该技能的资源消耗。
Increases the Damage dealt by Bladestorm.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Bladestorm's keybind can be held down to increase the Duration of the Skill.\nReduces the Damage dealt by the Skill.
允许在施放时长按来延长其持续时间。\n降低该技能造成的伤害。

Hephaäron learned of a rare material, Shiganite, that was as strong as Primordial metal, less brittle but more dense. He collected some of this unique ore from the high mountains of Wolcen and started work in his cliffside workshop. In his forge, Hephaäron soon discovered the metal was extremely unstable; to maintain its integrity, he created a long blade with a Shiganite core and a thick Primordial metal outer layer, which came to be known as Voknafein, The First Greatsword.
赫法耶博了解到了一种稀有材料——石贡岩，它和原初金属一样坚固，不像原初金属那么脆，但密度更大。他从Wolcen世界的高山上收集到了一些这种独特的矿石，并开始在他位于峭壁的工作间工作。在锻造过程中，赫法耶博很快发现这种金属极不稳定；为了保持它的完整性，他制造了一把长剑，石贡岩为芯，外层包裹上一层厚厚的原始金属，后来这把长剑被称为沃克纳芬，第一巨剑。
Bladestorm converts Weapon Physical Damage to Frost Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
剑刃风暴将武器物理伤害转化为冰霜伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

As Hephaäron continued to improve his swordsmanship, he heard a mournful shriek echo through the mountains, accompanied by an icy chill. As Etheliel’s lament passed through the mountain range, it disturbed a large mass of snow. It slowly began to slide down the mountain, picking up speed until it became a full-blown avalanche barrelling towards the workshop. With no time to react, Hephaäron planted his sword into the earth and gripped it tightly to endure the cascade of ice.
当赫法耶博继续提高他的剑术时，他听到一声悲伤的尖啸在山间回荡，伴随着冰冷的寒意。当耶特利尔的哀歌穿过山脉时，惊扰了一大片积雪。积雪慢慢地滑下山坡，逐渐加速，直到变成一场全面的雪崩，朝着赫法耶博的工作间飞驰。赫法耶博没有时间作出反应，只能把他的剑插进地里，紧紧地抓住它以承受冰层的冲击。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of Bladestorm.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt by Bladestorm.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Increases Bladestorm's Area of Effect.\nReduces the Tick Rate of the Skill.
增加该技能的作用范围。\n该技能造成伤害的频率降低。
When used, Bladestorm grants a Buff to both your Attack Speed and Cast Speed.\nAllies within the Skill's Area of Effect also receive this Buff.
该技能会在施放时提供一个Buff，提高你的攻击速度和施法速度。\n被该技能的范围波及的盟友也会获得该Buff。
Increases your Life Leech while dealing Damage with Bladestorm.
剑刃风暴造成伤害时提高你的吸血。
Increases the Rage generated from Enemies killed by Bladestorm.
提高该技能击杀敌人生成的怒气。
Critical Hits with Bladestorm give chance to automatically launch a chain lightning that bounces between Enemies.\nThe chain deals damage based on your Weapon Damage.
暴击时有几率自动触发在敌人间弹跳的闪电链。\n闪电链造成的伤害基于你的武器伤害。
Critical Hits with Bladestorm increase its Damage Tick Rate.
该技能造成暴击后，它的伤害频率会提高。
Increases your Attack Critical Chance Score when an Enemy is killed with Bladestorm.
每当该技能击杀敌人时，都会增加你的攻击暴击几率值。
A damaging shockwave is released when Bladestorm ends.
剑刃风暴结束时会释放一道伤害震波。
Incoming Enemy Projectiles are re-directed when Bladestorm is active.
技能持续期间可以偏转来袭的投射物。

Hephaäron was frustrated; he could barely carry the weapon, let alone use it. Despite his best efforts, the sword refused to stay upright. He asked Baäpheth, the First Warrior to test the weapon. Baäpheth held the sword high, feeling its crushing weight, then switched stance so that the weapon fell behind him. He launched into a sequence of spinning strikes, sending shockwaves of air bursting in all directions. Baäpheth’s only comment: the sword needed a heavier pommel, to balance out the dense blade.
赫法耶博很沮丧，他几乎拿不动这把武器，更不用说使用了。尽管他尽了最大努力，还是没法竖起剑。他请求第一战士拜费特来测试这把武器。拜费特高举这把剑，感觉到了它毁灭性的重量，然后改变姿势，让武器落在他身后。他发动了一连串旋转式的打击，向四面八方发射出空气爆炸产生的冲击波。拜费特唯一的评价是：剑柄上需要加个更沉的配重，来平衡高密度的剑刃。
Increases the Damage dealt by Bladestorm for every Ailment Stack an Enemy has.
敌人身上每有一层异常状态，该技能对其造成的伤害就会获得一定提升。
Bladestorm converts Weapon Physical Damage to Fire Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
剑刃风暴将武器物理伤害转化为火焰伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Among all Primordials, Abanazaar most struck his fellows with an air of youth: an entity fraught with barely controlled desires. He looked at Baäpheth’s weapons with jealousy and demanded a weapon of his own from Hephäaron. The Maestre hesitated : the Primordial of Fire’s incandescence might deform his pristine crafts. But recalling Voknafein, a weapon as volatile as Abanazaar himself, he saw a perfect match.
在所有的原初神之中阿巴纳扎给他的同胞们的印象最深的就是年轻气盛：一个充满了难以控制的欲望的存在。他嫉妒地看着拜费特的武器，向拜费特要了一把自己的武器。大师犹豫不决：火之源的炽热可能会使他崭新的作品变形。但回忆起沃克纳芬，一把和阿巴纳扎一样变化无常的武器，他看到了完美的匹配。
Bladestorm converts Weapon Physical Damage to Toxic Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
剑刃风暴将武器物理伤害转化为毒素伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Long ago, when Bezeriel was a more noble being, he petitioned the Maestre of Industry to place his poisons in the Armory of Creation. Hephäaron relented, washing Voknafein with the venom of a single viper and granting Bezeriel his mark in history. But when the Primordial War broke soon after, the Dissidents saw that Bezeriel had delivered his power into enemy hands. His punishment would lead to the first Primordial death.
很久很久以前，当时的贝泽瑞尔还没变坏，他请求制造之主把他的毒药放入造物武库。赫法耶博勉强答应了，用一条毒蛇的毒液清洗沃克纳芬，并刻上贝泽瑞尔的标志。但是，原初神战不久后爆发，持不同政见者看到贝泽瑞尔已经把他的力量交给了敌人。他受到的惩罚是成为第一个死去的原初神。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of Bladestorm.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Infinity Blades converts Weapon Physical Damage to Aether Damage.
无限之刃将武器物理伤害转化为以太伤害。
Adds an additional attack to Infinity Blades' combo.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
该技能的连击额外增加一段。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。
Adds an additional attack to Infinity Blades' combo.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
该技能的连击额外增加一段。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。
You generate Willpower when dealing Critical Hits with Infinity Blades.
该技能造成暴击时额外生成魔力。
You generate Willpower when an Enemy is killed with Infinity Blades.
该技能击杀敌人时额外生成魔力。
Enemies Hit by Infinity Blades receive a Debuff that increases Spell Damage dealt to them.
该技能击中敌人时施加一个DEBuff，提高他们受到的法术伤害。
After using the Skill, your next Hit with the Infinity Blades deals additional Damage as the Damage Type dealt by the Skill.
施放该技能后，无限之刃的下一击造成额外伤害，伤害类型与该技能一致。
Allows you to use Warrior Skills for a few seconds after Hitting an Enemy with Infinity Blades.
使用该技能击中敌人后的几秒内允许你施放战士技能。

Anulai-Tai, who would once become the Fallen Archduke of Infinity, was invested with a great kindness in his early days. Slipping through the non-linear chaos, he wove pins into the aether and constructed the fabric of time. At its center, the many threads in the needles found their anchor point in Anulai-Tai himself. His sacrifice meant that life flourished for mortal beings.
在成为堕落的无限大公之前，早年的阿努莱-泰被赋予了伟大的慈悲心。他在非线性的混沌中穿梭，把针织进以太，构造出了时间的织物。在其中央，阿努莱-泰让无数时间线穿过他的身躯，担任时间的锚点。他的牺牲意味着凡间的生命繁荣昌盛。
Using Infinity Blades grants a Buff of additional Damage as the Damage Type dealt by the Skill to nearby Allies.
授予附近的盟友一个Buff，根据该技能的基础伤害类型提供额外伤害。
Gives a chance to create a ghost that inflicts one additional Hit to the Enemy Hit by Infinity Blades.
使用该技能击中敌人时有几率生成一个幽灵盟友，对其进行一次额外打击。
Force Shield is regenerated per Enemy Hit with Infinity Blades.
该技能每次击中敌人都会为你回复护盾。
Increases the Damage dealt by Infinity Blades while you have Force Shield remaining.
护盾未空时该技能获得伤害加成。
Increases your Block Chance while using Infinity Blades.\nEnemy Hits that are Blocked apply Stasis on that Enemy.
使用无限之刃时提升格挡率。\n被成功格挡的敌人会陷入停滞。

Over the course of history, the threads bound to Anulai-Tai began to torture him, pulling him every which way. He soon came to despise time’s movements and desired them to stop. Moros tried to relieve his burden. While he could never understand the design of the aethereal weave, he held the tapestry together for a time. This legendary era was called the Boundless Dusk, as Moros’ darkness stretched through time while he replaced Anulai-Tai.
在历史的长河中，缠在阿努莱-泰身上的丝线开始折磨他，向不同方向拉扯他。他很快就开始仇视时间的运动，并希望它们停下来。摩洛斯试图减轻他的负担。虽然他永远无法理解这种飘逸的织法的设计，但他还是暂时地与织锦紧紧相连。这段传说纪元被称为无尽黄昏，当他接替阿努莱-泰的时候，摩洛斯的黑暗就随着时间无限延伸。
Increases the Damage dealt by Infinity Blades for every Ailment stack an Enemy has.
敌人身上每有一层异常状态，该技能对其造成的伤害就会获得一定提升。
Infinity Blades converts Weapon Physical Damage to Shadow Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
无限之刃将武器物理伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

When Anathëa and Moros danced in the First Movement of Creation, the world was naked before the chaotic movements of the universe. If there were to be men, there needed to be a realm governed by rules which they could live in. Anulai-Tai was commanded into existence by this cosmic lack.
在安娜蒂亚与摩洛斯在“造物启元”中翩翩起舞之时，世界尚是一片荒芜，宇宙的混沌运动刚刚开始。诞生人类的前提，是要有一套适宜人类生存的时空规则。宇宙的这一缺憾令阿努莱·泰应运而生。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt by Ailments applied with Infinity Blades.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt by Infinity Blades.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Infinity Blades converts Weapon Physical Damage to Rend Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
无限之刃将武器物理伤害转化为撕裂伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Anulai-Tai was approached by the Haithar of a tribe of First Men named Kantaroth. He agreed that Primordials and First Men should share the secrets of creation. Anulai-Tai apprenticed Kantaroth so he might take his place at the center of the Weave of Time. However, when its threads wove through his body, they sliced him like blades. His limbs were scattered across time, as was his feeble mind. Anulai-Tai could not escape the role ordained for him by fate.
一个来自初代人类部落海塔尔的叫做坎塔洛斯的人曾接近过阿努莱-泰。他们取得了原初神应当与初代人类分享造物秘密的共识。阿努莱-泰收坎塔洛斯为徒，以期他能接替自己在时间之纱中心的岗位。然而，当时间之线穿过坎塔洛斯的身体，他的肢体随着时间的流逝而零落，他虚弱的头脑也是如此。阿努莱-泰无法逃避命运赋予他的角色。
Infinity Blades converts Weapon Physical Damage to Frost Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
无限之刃将武器物理伤害转化为冰霜伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

At first, Anulai-Tai allowed time to flow as it desired. He might slow and speed it along, but never stopped it altogether. As the march of history began to pain him, he looked to Etheliel’s example so he could stop time altogether. Her ice could halt the functions of a body in their tracks, without giving way to the indignities of decomposition. He channeled that perfection through his blade, gracing every target within his reach with immortality.
一开始，阿努莱-泰对时间的推移放任自流。他可能会放慢速度，加快速度，但从来没有完全停止。当历史的进程开始使他痛苦时，他向耶特利尔看齐，这样他就可以完全停止时间了。她的冰可以停止身体的功能，而不会让腐烂有机可乘。他通过他的光刃来引导那种完美，使他所能触及的每一个目标都获得永生。
Increases the Damage dealt by Infinity Blades.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Parasite converts Weapon Physical Damage to Toxic Damage.
寄生将武器物理伤害转化为毒素伤害。
Parasite steals Willpower from Enemies instead of Health.
该技能的吸血改为吸魔。
Increases the Tick Rate of Parasite for every Ailment stack an Enemy has.
目标身上的每一层异常状态都会缩短汲取效果的每跳间隔。

The Sweet Tooth Worm causes a deep craving for sugar in order to provoke diabetic necrosis in the host body. The worm feasts on this rotting flesh storing it external skin sacks.  If put into contact with freezing temperatures, the Sweet Tooth will immediately enter hibernation and survive off of its supplies. This is the best time to collect them as spellcasting components. Some, such as the faithful of Bezeriel, raise them in warm pools in order to use them sustainably.
食糖寄生虫会使宿主产生对糖分的强烈渴求，从而导致宿主在糖尿病的侵蚀下浑身溃烂。这种虫子则会躲藏在尸体的表皮中，以腐烂的血肉为食。如果接触到低温，这种甜食性蠕虫会立即进入冬眠状态，依靠储存的食物维生。这是收集它们作为施法材料的最佳时机。一些人，比如贝泽瑞尔的信徒，把它们放在温暖的池子里，以便可持续地使用它们。
Increases the amount stolen per Parasite Tick.
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of Parasite.
增加该技能造成异常状态的几率值。
Gives a chance to generate a Health Globe when Parasite Ticks on Enemies.
寄生的汲取有几率生成生命球。
Parasite steals Force Shield from Enemies instead of Health.
Allows Parasite to also target Player Allies and transfer Health from you to them.
允许该技能以盟友为目标，将你的生命传输给他们。

The Sweet Tooth Worm strongly prefers rotting meat due to the small insects it attracts, and the heat generated by putrefaction. But if starved, they can be persuaded to partake in living meat, carrying the vital energy from one subject to another. Peasants are quick to stack them into their baskets to sell them to the nearest doctor, exposing themselves to the Sweet Worm’s deadly contagion.
由于腐烂产生的热量以及闻风而至的小昆虫，蛀虫对腐肉情有独钟。但如果饿了，它们也不介意啃食活体血肉，把生命的能量从一者带到另一者。有些乡下人会让自己暴露在蛀虫致命的感染下，然后迅速地把吸饱的蛀虫塞进篮子里，卖给最近的医生。
Enemies possessed by Parasite have increased Resistances.
操纵的怪物拥有更高的抗性。
Enemies possessed by Parasite drop additional Health Globes when they are killed.
操纵的怪物死后会掉落额外生命球。
Parasite converts Weapon Physical Damage to Shadow Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
寄生将武器物理伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Underneath each Temple of Bezeriel lies a broad green pool. The priests will open the gates to that underground refuge once per season, allowing filth encrusted beggars to rush in for a bath. There’s a tacit understanding between the priests and the beggars. Everyone has heard the rumours after all: the shadows have allowed something to proliferate in the water. Those who enter them will take something away, hidden underneath their skin.
在每座贝泽瑞尔神庙下面都有一个宽阔的绿色池塘。祭司们每个季节都会打开地下避难所的大门，让满身污秽的乞丐们冲进去洗澡。教士和乞丐之间有着默契。毕竟，每个人都听说过这样的谣言：影子允许某些存在在水中增殖。它们会钻入人体内拿走藏在皮肤下面的东西。
Increases the Damage dealt by Parasite.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt by Parasite.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Increases the Ailment Damage dealt by Ailments applied with Parasite.
提高该技能造成的异常状态伤害。
Increases the Critical Chance Score of Parasite.
增加该技能的暴击几率值。
Increases the Critical Damage dealt by Parasite.
提高该技能的暴击伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt by Parasite.\nReduces the Tick Rate of the Skill.
提高该技能造成的伤害。\n\n降低汲取效果的频率。
Parasite converts Weapon Physical Damage to Rend Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
寄生将武器物理伤害转化为撕裂伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The parasitic Sweet Tooth Worm is used as a component in magical rituals, particularly to transfer lifeforce from one subject to another. There’s a common misunderstanding about this mechanism: the worm doesn’t consume lifeforce per se. Rather it triggers sepsis and necrosis and consumes the decaying matter left behind. A healthy target will not produce the best healing effect; the wounded, ailing mark is more productive by far.
寄生的蛀虫被用作魔法仪式的一个组成部分，特别是将生命力从一个主体转移到另一个主体。对于这种机制有一个常见的误解：蠕虫本身并不消耗生命力。相反，它会引发败血症和坏死，并消耗掉留下的腐烂物质。一个健康的目标不会带来最好的治疗效果；受伤的、患病的目标效果更佳。
Parasite converts Weapon Physical Damage to Frost Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
寄生将武器物理伤害转化为冰霜伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

While Etheliel is said to have a distaste for violence, this accounts for too narrow a definition of the term. She is all too happy to bring death upon the enemies of her cult, drawing out the warmth of their bodies and leaving a serene corpse behind. That body warmth doesn’t go wasted, of course. Her cultists live in extreme climates and concentrate body heat into portable artefacts.
据说耶特利尔厌恶暴力，但这里暴力这个词的定义过于狭窄。她非常乐意将死亡带给她教徒的敌人，抽出他们身体的温暖，留下一具安详的尸体。当然，他们身体中残留的温度不会被浪费。她那些生活在极端的气候条件下的信徒，会把尸体的热量灌注到可以随身携带的遗物中。
Increases the Damage dealt by Parasite.
提高该技能造成的伤害。
Feeding Swarm deals Damage based on your Weapon Damage.
厄食尸群造成的伤害基于你的武器伤害。
Increases the size of your Feeding Swarm's Summons, increasing their Health and the Damage they deal.\nReduces the number of Melee zombies you can summon.
召唤物体型增大，生命值和造成的伤害提高。\n最大召唤数减少。

As the Primordial of Mortality, Bezeriel concerned himself with Death as a separation of soul and body. As a Fallen, his presence on Wolcen is more akin to an open gullet siphoning faith. One worshipper in agony has prayers worth five healthy parishioners, and one class of victim produces more necrotic power than any other: the sick.
作为死亡之源，贝泽瑞尔将死亡视为灵魂与身体的分离。作为一个堕落者，他在Wolcen的存在更像是一个开放的吸食信仰的沟壑。一个处于痛苦中信徒的祈祷比五个健康教区居民的更有价值，有一类受害者比其他任何一类人产生的死灵力量都多：病人。
Increases the Damage dealt by the Feeding Swarm's Summons but reduces their Health.
减少召唤物的生命值。\n\n提高召唤物伤害。
Feeding Swarm's Summons explode when they are killed or at the end of their charge, dealing Damage in an Area of Effect.
召唤物被击杀或冲锋结束，都会自爆，造成范围伤害。

Plague acts as an effective recruitment tool. The cult creates an underclass of lepers, then offer them shelter where no one else will grant it. This results in a steady supply of cannon fodder, all too eager to release themselves into death during the battle.
瘟疫是一种有效的招募工具。毁灭邪教创造出一批身患传染病的社会底层，然后雪中送炭般为他们提供庇护所。他们在战场上浴血奋战死而后已，成为邪教用之不竭的炮灰。
When you have reached the maximum Feeding Swarm's Summons, using the Skill increases the Damage they deal.\nIf used with the Cadaverine modifier, the explosion damage increases.
召唤数量达到上限时，施放该技能会提高它们造成的伤害。\n如果激活了“尸胺”修正，则提高爆炸伤害。
Feeding Swarm converts Weapon Physical Damage to Fire Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
厄食尸群将武器物理伤害转化为火焰伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The Hierarch of Infestation once declared outright war upon the worshippers of Anathëa. Targeting a temple north of Varg, where the days are longest, the Shepherds of Plague gathered the sickly beggars put under their protection into a ditch. They doused the wretches with oil and cast a fire into the pit. Desperate for aid and relief, the flaming forces ran amok, devastating the Temple of Dawn.
瘟疫主教曾经向安娜蒂亚的信徒宣战，目标是法吉北部白天最长的一座神庙，瘟疫牧师把他们平日蓄养的患病贫民聚集到沟里，把油浇在这些可怜的人身上，然后向沟里放火。贫民们为了报答邪教的援助和救济奋不顾身，燃烧的军队豕突狼奔，摧毁了黎明神庙。
Feeding Swarm converts Weapon Physical Damage to Aether Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
厄食尸群将武器物理伤害转化为以太伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The Cult of Doom draws its mystical power from prolonged suffering, and is ever searching for new means to cause pain. For this purpose, they invited representatives of the Cult of Infinity. The wards of the Hierarch of Infestation were subjected to the agonies of time condensed into seconds, their flesh morphing and withering faster than they should possibly be allowed to. From this torment, the Shepherds of Plague found a new sub-variety of energy available to them.
毁灭邪教从长期的折磨中汲取神秘力量，并且一直在寻找引起痛苦的新方法。为此，他们邀请了无限邪教的代表。瘟疫主教的守卫遭受了浓缩为几秒的时间折磨，他们血肉变形和枯萎的速度超过了承受极限。从这种折磨中，瘟疫的掌控者们发现了一种可供他们使用的全新类别的能量。
Feeding Swarm converts Weapon Physical Damage to Toxic Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
厄食尸群将武器物理伤害转化为毒素伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The creation of a servile workforce involves the deliberate contamination of food and water resources within a given community. Nearby collectivities are quick to quarantine the area and cease all trade, thus leaving the sick in a needy position. The cult of Doom appears almost as a hero, willing to entreat with the lepers where no one else would.
创造劳工奴隶的手段包括故意污染特定社区内的食物和水资源。附近的集体会迅速隔离该地区并停止所有贸易，从而使病人处于贫困状态。毁灭邪教这时候会像英雄一样站出来，在没有人愿意待的地方接受传染病人的恳求。
Increases the number of Feeding Swarm's Summons you can have.
Increases the Health of Feeding Swarm's Summons.\nReduces the number of Melee zombies you can summon.
增加召唤物的生命值。\n最大召唤数减少。
Increases the Damage dealt by Feeding Swarm's Summons.
Increases the Damage dealt by Feeding Swarm's Summons.
Increases the Damage dealt by Feeding Swarm's Summons.
Increases the Health of Feeding Swarm's Summons.
Increases the Health of Feeding Swarm's Summons.
Increases the Movement Speed and Health of Feeding Swarm's Summons.
提高召唤物的移动速度和生命值。
Increases the Movement Speed of Feeding Swarm's Summons.
Feeding Swarm converts Weapon Physical Damage to Rend Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
厄食尸群将武器物理伤害转化为撕裂伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Abanazaar, Primordial of Fire, chased his romantic rival Moros across Wolcen fruitlessly: he could never touch him, the brightness of his flames antithetical to Moros’ Dusk. Abanazaar switched strategies. He dressed himself up in smoke and began casting shadows of his own. He was fearsome in this form, casting a scalding blast of dust at his foes and leaving them dumbstruck.
阿巴纳扎，火之源，追逐他的情敌摩洛斯穿越了整个Wolcen世界仍然徒劳无功：他永远碰不到对方，他的火焰的光辉与摩洛斯的黄昏背道而驰。阿巴纳扎改变了策略。他把自己打扮成烟雾，开始投下自己的影子。他这种可怕的形态，向他的敌人投下滚烫的烟尘，让他们惊恐万分。
Feeding Swarm converts Weapon Physical Damage to Lightning Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
厄食尸群将武器物理伤害转化为闪电伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The Hierarch’s hordes cannot sustain their undead state for long. They lack the spark of life which invites a muscle to contract, that speaks commands from brain to limb. To delay the moment until they must return to the maggots and dirt, they draw the natural electricity from their living enemies until, inevitably, their heart stops beating.
主教的爪牙不能长期维持它们的不死状态。它们缺乏能让肌肉收缩的生命火花，无法将指令从大脑传递到肢体。为了推迟它们不得不回到蛆虫和泥土中的时刻，它们从活着的敌人那里汲取生物电，直到它们的心脏不可避免地停止跳动。
Increases the Damage dealt by Feeding Swarm's Summons.
提高该技能召唤物的伤害。
Increases the Health of Feeding Swarm's Summons.
Increases the Attack Speed of Feeding Swarm's Summons.
提高召唤物的攻击速度。
Hunting Swarm deals Damage based on your Weapon Damage.
猎食尸群造成的伤害基于你的武器伤害。
Projectiles launched by Hunting Swarm's Summons explode when they Hit an Enemy, dealing Damage in an Area of Effect.
召唤物射出投射物会在命中敌人时爆炸，造成范围伤害。

Bezeriel devised a plan to elevate the bodies of the dead up into the sky, to touch Anathëa who had never known mortality. He rejoiced as Death’s rot began to spread inside Anathëa’s belly, the sparks of light and plasma in her body collapsing into smoke and ashes. She vomited this tainted matter onto Wolcen, barely saving herself. The regurgitated dead stood up from the waste, when they ought never to stand again. The power of the sun had granted them a semblance of new life.
贝泽瑞尔想出了一个计划，把死者的尸体抬升到空中，去触摸从未体验过死亡的安娜蒂亚。当死亡的腐烂开始在安娜蒂亚的肚子里蔓延，她体内的光明的火花和等离子体化为烟雾和灰烬，贝泽瑞尔欣喜不已。她把这些有毒物质呕吐在Wolcen世界上，几丧命。反刍的死尸从荒野中站了起来，而它们本不应该再站起来。太阳的力量给了它们新生的假象。
Projectiles launched by Hunting Swarm's Summons can Pierce.
召唤物射出投射物能穿透敌人。
Increases the Attack Speed of Hunting Swarm's Summons after the Skill is used to focus their fire on the targeted location.
施放此技能对指定位置进行集火后，召唤物的攻击速度会得到提高。
Increases the Damage dealt by Hunting Swarm's Summons but reduces their Health.
提高召唤物伤害。\n\n降低召唤物的生命值。

Though Bezeriel couldn’t obtain a dead sun from Anathëa, his curiosity was peaked by the new form of unlife produced by her brush with death. He shepherded the revenants and taught them to spread their state of being to the First Men. This conflict had allowed consciousness to triumph over the body’s limits.
虽然贝泽瑞尔无法从安娜蒂亚那里得到一颗死灵太阳，但她与死亡擦身而过产生的一种新的非生命形式却让他的好奇心达到了顶峰。他牧养了还魂者，教他们把自己的生存状态传播给初代人类。这种冲突的形态让意识能够超越肉体的桎梏。
Hunting Swarm converts Weapon Physical Damage to Toxic Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
猎食尸群将武器物理伤害转化为毒素伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The hunters of Bezeriel were mistakenly thought to be clumsy shooters, always missing the vital spots in their prey. Little did those gossiping witnesses know that the archers of Doom didn’t desire to kill. The tips of their arrows were covered in hazardous contaminants. Those beasts and men who were struck by them would carry infection wherever they went, spreading the Hierarch of Infestation’s design around the world.
贝泽瑞尔的猎人常被误认为是笨拙的射手，总是错过猎物的重要部位。传出那些流言蜚语的目击者很少知道，毁灭射手的意图不在于杀伤。他们的箭尖上布满了危险的污染物。那些被它们袭击的动物和人无论走到哪里都会携带病毒，在全世界传播瘟疫主教的设计。
Hunting Swarm converts Weapon Physical Damage to Frost Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
猎食尸群将武器物理伤害转化为冰霜伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The northmost cults of Bezeriel infringed upon Etheliel’s territory, thereby spreading their own power. Their sacrifices would be buried up to the neck in snow, left to die a slow death of cold. From there, the body would naturally mummify in the ice, mutating into a new form. The Diamond Legion protects these mummies, as their peaceful expressions and smooth skins reflect Etheliel’s ideals.
大陆最北方的贝泽瑞尔邪教侵犯了耶特利尔的领地，从此开始传播了他们自己的力量。他们的祭品会被雪埋到脖子，让他们在寒冷中慢慢死去。从那里开始，尸体会在冰上自然变成木乃伊，变异成新的形状。钻石军团保护着这些木乃伊，因为它们平静的表情和光滑的皮肤反映了耶特利尔的理想。
Hunting Swarm converts Weapon Physical Damage to Shadow Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
猎食尸群将武器物理伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

As the first generations of the First Men died out, Bezeriel frowned. It seemed unfair that the dead should have no sun of their own though they far outnumbered the living. He went to Anathëa and asked her to give him a dead sun which would oversee the Ailing Marshes where lie those who die of sickness. Anathëa rejected Bezeriel’s request: creating a new sun would be akin to abandoning a child to Bezeriel. The then-lord of mortality resolved that if Anathëa wouldn’t help him, he would corrupt her himself with a great burst of necrotic energy.
随着第一代人类的死亡，贝泽瑞尔皱起了眉头。亡者的数量远远超过活着的人，但他们没有属于自己的太阳，这不公平。他去找安娜蒂亚，要求给他也整一个太阳，让他可以监视病死之人的归宿，疫病沼泽。安娜蒂亚拒绝了贝泽瑞尔的要求：创造一个新的太阳就像把一个自己的孩子遗弃给贝泽瑞尔。当时死亡之王下定决心，如果安娜蒂亚不帮助他，他就亲自用一股强大的坏死能量腐蚀她。
Increases the number of Hunting Swarm's Summons you can have.
Reduces the number of Hunting Swarm's Summons you can have, but increases the Damage they deal.
减少最大召唤数，但提高召唤物造成的伤害。
Increases the Damage dealt by Hunting Swarm's Summons.
Increases the Damage dealt by Hunting Swarm's Summons.
Increases the Damage dealt by Hunting Swarm's Summons.
Increases the Health of Hunting Swarm's Summons.
Increases the Health of Hunting Swarm's Summons.
Increases the Movement Speed and Health of Hunting Swarm's Summons.
提高召唤物的移动速度和生命值。
Increases the Movement Speed of Hunting Swarm's Summons.
提高召唤物的移动速度。
Hunting Swarm converts Weapon Physical Damage to Fire Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
猎食尸群将武器物理伤害转化为火焰伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The Hierarch of Infestation led a counter strike against the Republicans. By the time he reached the fortress of Starkmarr, the Republicans understood that crossbows would do little against the undead hordes. They unloaded their lightning cannons on the shamblers, hoping to burn their bodies and end their march. That hope fizzled. The dead raised their flaming bows and took aim.
瘟疫主教领导了一场针对共和国的反击。当他抵达斯塔克玛要塞时，共和党人明白了弩箭对不死大军没有什么作用。他们用电磁炮轰击这些行尸，希望将它们烧毁，终结它们的进军。然而希望落空了。死者举起燃烧的弓瞄准了目标。
Hunting Swarm converts Weapon Physical Damage to Aether Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the Skill.
猎食尸群将武器物理伤害转化为以太伤害。\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

The targets eliminated in Anulai-Tai’s name tend to leave traces behind. Chosen for assassination due to their impact on history, faint echoes of the events that could have been linger behind. A Trailblazer of the Brotherhood of Dawn haunts Alia still, unaware of the Republic’s victorious claim over these lands. He appears as an aethereal ghost, stringing his bow in rehearsal for a battle that has long passed without him. A battle which he could have won.
以阿努莱-泰之名被淘汰的目标往往会留下痕迹。由于他们对历史的影响而被选为暗杀者，这些事件的微弱回响可能会一直挥之不去。黎明兄弟会的开拓者仍然出没于阿利亚，无视共和国对这些土地的主权。他看起来像一个虚幻的幽灵，为一场久违的战斗操练弓箭。为了一场他本该赢下的战斗。
Increases the Damage dealt by Hunting Swarm's Summons.
提高该技能召唤物的伤害。
Increases the Health of Hunting Swarm's Summons.
Increases the Attack Speed of Hunting Swarm's Summons.
提高召唤物的攻击速度。
Livor Mortis deals Damage based on your Weapon Damage.
斑尸造成的伤害基于你的武器伤害。
Livor Mortis converts Weapon Physical Damage to Toxic Damage.
斑尸将武器物理伤害转化为毒素伤害。

The candidates are invited into a room half-mortuary, half-theater. There, they consume the rotten flesh of the dead, take brown blood into their veins, sew pieces of the cadavers onto themselves. That is the first week. Should the candidate survive it, the transformation into an Immortal Maw takes place over a month. The subject’s body turns bloated and purple and emits a putrid sheen. Gums recede to show oversized fangs. A hunger buries itself in the pit of their stomachs, which must be sated by flesh yet will go on hungering. They walk behind the Shepherds of Plague, ready to take any attacks thrown at them. This is what it means to embrace Bezeriel.
候选人被邀请进入一个半停尸房，半剧院的房间。在那里，他们吃掉死者的腐肉，把褐色的血注入血管，把尸体的碎片缝在自己身上。那是第一周。如果候选人活下来，一个月后就会变成一只不朽巨口。受试者的身体变得臃肿发紫，并散发出一种腐烂的光泽。牙龈后退，露出超大的尖牙。它们的胃里埋藏着饥饿的本质，必须用血肉来满足，但永远无法填饱。它们走在瘟疫牧师身后，随时准备接下任何对他们的攻击。这就是拥抱贝泽瑞尔的含义。
Livor Mortis' Summon receives a portion of the Damage dealt to you.
你所受的一部分伤害会转移给该召唤物。

Like all religious cloisters, the Cult of Bezeriel invites competition between its believers, but they may hold the most perverse incarnation of this phenomenon. The Shepherds speak in demeaning terms to their parish, comparing them unfavorably to those who make the ultimate sacrifice: the Immortal Maws. They used to be men, believers who once aspired to the priesthood. The process to change into an Immortal Maw kills most who attempt it, and yet they are honoured as their death brings vigor to the cult.
就像所有的宗教组织一样，对贝泽瑞尔的崇拜引起了信徒之间的竞争，但他们可能这种竞争现象最反常的化身。牧师用贬低的言语将教区的信众与那些做出了最终牺牲的人——不朽巨口——进行恶劣的比较。不朽巨口过去都是人类，是渴望成为祭司的虔诚信徒。而变成不死之躯的过程会杀死大多数试图这样做的人，但他们的死亡给邪教带来了活力，因此他们受到尊敬。
Livor Mortis converts Weapon Physical Damage to Shadow Damage.\nThe golem can leap onto Enemies, dealing Damage.
斑尸将武器物理伤害转化为暗影伤害。\n傀儡能跳向敌人并造成伤害。

When Moros attempted to lull Bezeriel into an eternal sleep, he and all his faithful were condemned to act as the Primordial of Doom's warden. Moros' devotees march, corraling the Immortal Maws into place.
当摩洛斯试图使贝泽瑞尔陷入永恒的睡眠时，他和他所有的信徒被判处充当毁灭之源的看守人。摩洛斯的奉献者们行进着，将不朽巨口驱赶到位。
Livor Mortis converts Weapon Physical Damage to Lightning Damage.\nThe golem can create a shield that Blocks incoming Damage.
斑尸将武器物理伤害转化为闪电伤害。\n傀儡能制造一个阻挡伤害的防护罩。

The flair of justice still runs through Beelmalik, even in his Fallen state. His faithful Punishers hunt the cultists of Bezeriel, paying special attention to the Immortal Maws who stand as the cult’s greatest achievement, and its most repugnant crime. They lash at their backs with lightning. For those that fall, it is a mercy. Those that live will become an everlasting example in their hands.
比马利克即使是处于堕落的状态，他身上依然洋溢着正义的气息。他忠实的惩罚者们追捕贝泽瑞尔的信徒，特别关注那些被邪教徒视为至高成就，同时也是最可憎罪行的不朽巨口。惩罚者用闪电鞭笞他们的后背。对于那些死去的来说，死亡是一种解脱。因为那些活着的将成为他们手中永恒的警示。
Increases the Threat of Livor Mortis' Summon.
召唤物会造成更多仇恨。
Increases the Ailment Chance Score of Livor Mortis' Summon.
增加该技能召唤物造成异常状态的几率值。
Increases the Attack Speed of Livor Mortis' Summon.
提高召唤物的攻击速度。
When the Skill is used, Livor Mortis' Summon applies Frenzy to Enemies in an Area of Effect around the golem. Frenzied Enemies can turn on each other.
施放该技能时会使召唤物身边一定范围内的敌人狂乱。狂乱的敌人会转而互相攻击。
Increases the Damage dealt by Livor Mortis' Summon.
Increases the Damage dealt by Livor Mortis' Summon.
Increases the Damage dealt by Livor Mortis' Summon.
Increases the Health of Livor Mortis' Summon.
Increases the Health of Livor Mortis' Summon.
Increases the Movement Speed of Livor Mortis' Summon.
提高召唤物的移动速度。
Increases the Attack Speed of Livor Mortis' Summon.
提高召唤物的攻击速度。
Increases the Threat and the Health of Livor Mortis' Summon.
召唤物会造成更多仇恨并增加召唤物的生命值。
Livor Mortis converts Weapon Physical Damage to Rend Damage.\nIncreases the Damage dealt by the golem.
斑尸将武器物理伤害转化为撕裂伤害。\n\n提高该技能造成的伤害。

Einsam Facility was more than a laboratory: it was a temple to Ezaneal’s genius. The problem was, the locals were beginning to notice too and broke in looking for evidence of cultist activity. It’s only when the launchers clicked and the plasma grenades shot through the air that the townspeople realized they weren’t alone. The researchers watched blood and liquefied viscera drip down the drain, recording details of this weapon trial. No bodies, no witnesses.
因萨姆研究所不仅仅是一个实验室：它是伊查内亚的天才殿堂。问题是，当地人也开始注意到了，于是破门而入寻找邪教活动的证据。只有当发射装置咔嚓一声，等离子手榴弹从空中射出时，镇上的人才意识到他们并不孤单。研究人员观察血液和液化内脏滴下下水道，记录下这次武器试验的细节。没有尸体，没有目击者。
Increases the Health and the Damage dealt by Livor Mortis' Summon.
提高该技能召唤物的伤害。
Increases the Attack Speed of Livor Mortis' Summon.
提高召唤物的攻击速度。
Anomaly converts Weapon Physical Damage to Aether Damage.
紊乱将武器物理伤害转化为以太伤害。
Anomaly pulls in Enemies multiple times.
漩涡可以多次牵引敌人。

The vortex left behind by Anulai-Tai’s exit was so strong that those who resisted its pull saw the blood drain out through their skin, helplessly inhaled by the eye of the storm.
